==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|type=21}}

===Etymology===
So named as it was brought to China by {{w|Zhang Qian}} from the [[Arsacid]] Empire ({{zh-l|*安石}}) in Irania.

The botanist {{w|Li Shizhen}} suggests that {{och-l|榴}} here is the same as {{och-l|瘤|lump, tumour}}, as the pomegranate fruit resembles cancerous outgrowth on the body.
